title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Using Geometry (Area of Triangle) 3/3:

2 points are earned for the correct integral where one point is earned for the correct limits and one point is earned for the correct integrand

1 point is earned for the correct antidifferentiation and evaluation

0/1 if integrand is not ex - x or x - ex

Area = ∫ 0 4 e x − x d x = e x − x 2 2 | 0 4 = ( e 4 − 16 2 ) − ( e 0 − 0 ) = e 4 − 9 ≈ 45.598

OR

Using y-axis 3/3:

2 points are earned for the correct integral where one point is earned for the correct limits and one point is earned for answering all 3 integrands correct

Note: 0/2 if any limits incorrect
